Uses of Class
OnGrid

    • Uses of OnGrid in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of OnGrid in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Boot
      A class for the boot collectable which also sets up the two enumerations fire and flipper.
      class  Cell
      Stores basic information about a cell.
      class  Collectable
      This class represents the generic behaviours of all the collectables in the game.
      class  ColouredDoor
      Class that adds coloured doors.
      class  DeadlyTile
      Stores basic information about a Deadly Tile and kills players that step on this if they don't have the correct boots.
      class  Door
      A class that represents a door that can tried to be opened when stepped on by a player, moving them back if they couldn't open it.
      class  DumbTargetEnemy
      An enemy that tries to walk in a straight line towards the player.
      class  Enemy
      An moving entity that calculates its own next move.
      class  Entity
      An abstract class representing something that goes on top of cells on a map.
      class  Fire
      Stores basic information about a Fire Tile Kills entities that step on this specific tile
      class  Goal
      A cell that causes the player to win when they step on it.
      class  Ground
      A basic cell that doesn't do anything when stepped on.
      class  HintBlock
      An entity that updates the hint in the level UI when stepped on by a player.
      class  Key
      A collectable key that has a Color.
      class  Moving
      An entity that can move.
      class  Player
      A player that can move about the map
      class  PushBlock
      A block that can be pushed by a player over ground and can turn water into ground(PushBlockInWater).
      class  PushBlockInWater
      A ground cell but has the image of a push block in water.
      class  SmartTargetEnemy
      An enemy that uses the A Star Path Finding algorithm to move towards the player.
      class  StraightLineEnemy
      An enemy that walks in a straight line, turning around and moving in the opposite direction when it reaches a wall.
      class  Teleporter
      A cell that teleports you to another teleporter in the direction they were travelling.
      class  Token
      A collectable pile of tokens that increases the number of tokens in a player's inventory when collected.
      class  TokenDoor
      A door that requires a certain amount of tokens to open.
      class  Wall
      A basic cell that doesn't allow moving entities to stay on it.
      class  WallFollowEnemy
      Wall follow
      class  Water
      A DeadlyTile that requires flippers to cross.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type OnGrid 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Enemy.canWalkOn(OnGrid gridObject) 
      boolean Moving.canWalkOn(OnGrid gridObject)
      Checks if this is allowed to walk on an object on the grid.
